submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = defaultdict(list)  # m -> d
        x_list = []  # v -> x_list
        
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n - i - 1]
            diff = abs(a - b)
            
            x = max(a, b, k - a, k - b)  # X -> x
            
            d[diff].append(x)
            x_list.append(x)
        
        ans = n
        x_list.sort()
        
        for diff, xs in d.items():  # values -> xs
            t = bisect.bisect_left(x_list, diff) * 2 + (n // 2 - bisect.bisect_left(x_list, diff))  # T -> t
            
            for x in xs:  # X -> x
                if x < diff:
                    t -= 2
                else:
                    t -= 1
            
            ans = min(ans, t)
        
        return ans
